protein.specific_function: Ras effector protein. May function as an upstream activator and/or downstream effector for RAB5B in endocytic pathway. May function as a guanine nucleotide exchange (GEF) of RAB5B, required for activating the RAB5 proteins by exchanging bound GDP for free GTP

reference.reference_text: Saito K, Murai J, Kajiho H, Kontani K, Kurosu H, Katada T: A novel binding protein composed of homophilic tetramer exhibits unique properties for the small GTPase Rab5. J Biol Chem. 2002 Feb 1;277(5):3412-8. Epub 2001 Dec 3.
